title: Beijing's Most Luxurious Hotel: NUO Hotel Beijing with Exclusive Club Lounge Access
description: Immerse yourself in the rich history and electric atmosphere of China’s capital, staying in one of the country’s top luxury hotels: the five-star NUO Hotel Beijing. Inspired by the Ming dynasty, this stylish city oasis features an authentic tea house, a 25-metre heated indoor pool and more. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, access to the 25th floor Executive Lounge with daily afternoon tea and nightly cocktail hour and a leisurely late 2pm checkout.
offer_address: 2A Jiangtai Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing, 100016 P.R. China 中国北京朝阳区将台路甲2号

title: Five-Star Lakeside Kempinski Luxury
description: Immerse yourself in the rich history and electric atmosphere of China’s capital, while staying just outside the city at a five-star hotel like no other. Belonging to the world-renowned Kempinski collection of high-end properties, the Sunrise Kempinski Hotel is an architectural triumph perched on the edge of a tranquil lake near the ancient Great Wall of China. Includes daily breakfast, daily replenished minibar, dining credit, an airport drop-off and a late checkout.
offer_address: 18, Jia, Yanshui Road, Yanqi Lake, Huairou, Beijing, China, 101407

title: Beijing's Most Luxurious Hotel: NUO Hotel Beijing
description: Immerse yourself in the rich history and electric atmosphere of China’s capital, staying in one of the country’s top luxury hotels: the five-star NUO Hotel Beijing. Inspired by the Ming dynasty, this stylish city oasis features an authentic tea house, a 25-metre heated indoor pool and more. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, access to the 25th floor Executive Lounge with daily afternoon tea and nightly cocktail hour and late checkout.
offer_address: 2A Jiangtai Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing, 100016 P.R. China 中国北京朝阳区将台路甲2号

title: Beijing's Most Luxurious Hotel: NUO Hotel Beijing with Exclusive Club Lounge Access YIDU DUPLICATE
description: Immerse yourself in the rich history and electric atmosphere of China’s capital, staying in one of the country’s top luxury hotels: the five-star NUO Hotel Beijing. Inspired by the Ming dynasty, this stylish city oasis features an authentic tea house, a 25-metre heated indoor pool and more. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, access to the 25th floor Executive Lounge with daily afternoon tea and nightly cocktail hour and a leisurely late 2pm checkout.
offer_address: 2A Jiangtai Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing, 100016 P.R. China 中国北京朝阳区将台路甲2号

title: Opulent Beijing Kempinski Stay with Six Restaurants & Bars
description: Indulge in timeless European-inspired luxury seamlessly blended with the rich history and traditions of China at Kempinski Hotel Beijing Lufthansa Center. Part of the globally recognised collection of luxe hotels, this elegant property features a long list of glamorous facilities, including a rooftop pool, tranquil gardens and six unforgettable restaurants and bars offering a diverse range of locally and internationally inspired cuisine - including the locally inspired Dargon Palace, and the award-winning Paulaner Bräuhaus. The hotel's major draw is the direct connection to the Lufthansa Center; a vast assembly of luxury shopping, dining and entertainment options.
offer_address: 50 Liangmaqiao Road Chaoyang District

title: Contemporary Beijing Break Near the Great Wall of China with Indoor Pool
description:
Immerse yourself on the outskirts of China's capital with a stay at this idyllic five-star hotel, perfectly positioned within the enchanting Yanqing District, home to the Great Wall of China. Indulge in sumptuous dining across three exquisite onsite eateries, step into a haven of serenity at the spa or plunge into the glittering indoor pool.

When you're ready to explore, find yourself in the heart of one of Beijing's trendiest districts, with fashion-forward boutiques and mouthwatering cuisine. Venture out to the nearby Badaling Wildlife Park or head to central Beijing to marvel at the architectural brilliance of the Beijing National Stadium, also known as the Bird's Nest.
offer_address: No.1, Fu Kang South Road, Yanqing District, Beijing, 102100, China

title: Sophisticated Beijing Escape near Forbidden City & Tian'anmen Square with Indoor Pool
description:
Step into the vibrant heart of China's capital from this luxury hotel located in the bustling Xidan commerical district near the iconic Forbidden City and Tian'anmen Square. Explore famed history, stroll along the bustling Wangfujing Street for world-class shopping and dining, and don’t miss the chance to try the city’s legendary Peking Duck.

After a day of discovery, retreat to your elegant accommodation and unwind with a refreshing cocktail at Le Bar. Relax with a leisurely swim in the indoor pool, or indulge in local cuisine at the Cantonese-inspired China Kitchen.
offer_address: 6 Xuanwumen Nei Avenue, Xicheng District, Beijing 100031, China

title: Sophisticated Beijing Break in the Heart of the Vibrant Lido District
description: Embrace Beijing elegance and discover the city's many treasures with a stylish stay at Crowne Plaza Beijing Lido, an IHG Hotel. After day trips spent exploring the ancient Forbidden City, climbing the Great Wall or experiencing oriental splendour at the iconic Summer Palace, return and admire the ever-changing cityscape by the hotel’s glorious sky-high pool, or toast to your escape with a whisky at the sultry CHAR Bar & Grill.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Beijing Lido, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Building A, No. 6 Jiangtai Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing 100004, China

title: Beijing Sanlitun City Escape with Michelin Guide Steakhouse Restaurant
description: Live it up in Beijing's coolest entertainment area when you stay at InterContinental Beijing Sanlitun, a fashion-forward escape close to world-famous sites including the Forbidden City and the Temple of Heaven. There are five exquisite restaurants onsite where you can treat your tastebuds: be sure to head up to Top Bar for an extensive selection of single-malt whiskies, or go full luxe with a meal at CHAR Bar & Grill, a fine-dining steakhouse with a spot in the Michelin Guide.
offer_address: No. 1 South Sanlitun Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing 100027, China

title: Beijing Grand Hyatt City Sophistication with Indoor Lagoon Pool & Acclaimed Dining
description:
A lavish Grand Hyatt set within Beijing’s Oriental Plaza, this city landmark elevates the urban hotel experience with soaring interiors, polished service and a showstopping indoor pool set beneath stone grottos. Dining is central to the experience - celebrated Made in China serves legendary Peking duck in a theatre of open kitchens, while The Balcony brings a generous buffet spread.

Club Oasis features a sprawling 1,500-square-metre pool that instantly transports you to the tropics, a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a spa offering indulgent body and facial treatments. With elegant interiors that blend East and West and a location that puts the city’s most iconic landmarks within easy reach, it’s a polished base for exploring the capital.
offer_address: 1 East Chang An Avenue, Beijing, China, 100738

title: Elegant Beijing Stay with Indoor Pool & Three Sumptuous Restaurants
description: Timeless elegance meets the rich history and tradition of the Chinese capital at Crowne Plaza Beijing Sun Palace, an IHG Hotel. Find yourself within arm's reach of world-famous sites including the Forbidden City and the Temple of Heaven. Make the most of your escape by treating your tastebuds at three innovative onsite restaurants,  or rejuvenate your mind and body at the expansive wellness centre, featuring a dazzling pool.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Beijing Sun Palace, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Yunnan Dasha, North-East Corner of Taiyanggong Bridge, Beijing 100028, China

title: Five-Star Beijing Stay Connected to China National Convention Centre
description: Flaunting a spectacular location in the heart of Beijing's Olympic Business District, InterContinental Beijing Beichen is the city oasis you've been searching for - offering easy access China National Convention Centre (CNCC). This five-star hotel invites you to make a splash in the door pool, get moving in the modern fitness centre and wine and dine your way across three unforgettable restaurants and bars showcasing a diverse range of locally and internationally inspired cuisine.
location_description: InterContinental Beijing Beichen, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 8 Beichen West Road, Beijing, 100105, China

title: Sophisticated Beijing City Break near Airport
description: Discover the best of vibrant Beijing with a stay at Crowne Plaza Beijing International Airport, an IHG Hotel, positioned just minutes from Capital International Airport. Positioned at the halfway point between the ancient Forbidden City and the must-visit Great Wall, you'll be ideally placed to discover Beijing's mix of iconic sights. A jet-setter's dream, the hotel offers pure relaxation before take-off, with a dazzling pool and onsite restaurants offering splendid seasonal fare.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Beijing International Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Capital Airport, 60 Fuqian 1 Street, Tianzhu, Beijing 101312, China

title: Stylish Beijing Mountain Retreat Near World Heritage-Listed Great Wall
description: Among wild duck wetlands, natural hot springs and the grandeur of the World Heritage-listed Great Wall of China, Crowne Plaza Beijing Badaling, an IHG Hotel, offers guests modern comfort in the heart of one of Beijing’s most cherished heritage regions. After days spent exploring Yehayu Wetland Park, Longqing Gorge and the mighty Great Wall, head to Cai Feng Xiao Guan onsite for regional dishes steeped in tradition or Mian Xiang for casual noodles in a relaxed setting.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Beijing Badaling, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Building No. 1- 14, No.1 Guishui North Street, Beijing, 102100, Mainland China

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Beijing Chaoyang U Town
title: Stylish Central Beijing City Break near Olympic Green & Sanlitun Street
description: At the heart of the bustling Chinese capital stands Crowne Plaza Beijing Chaoyang U-Town, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned among leafy embassies, ultra-modern Olympic Green parkways and Sanlitun, China’s unrivalled king of upscale shopping, first-class dining and top-shelf bars. After discovering the best of Beijing, return to C6 Cafe for modern plates showcasing local flavours or Hopfenstube German Restaurant for local-brewed beers celebrating Bavaria's beer-making heritage.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Beijing Chaoyang U-Town, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 3 Sanfeng North Area, Chaoyang District, Beijing 100020, China

title: Shangri-La Sky-High Beijing Escape with Seven Restaurants & Bars
description: Indulge in signature Shangri-La luxury at the sky-high, China World Summit Wing, Beijing, ideally located in the city's financial centre. Glide to the 64th floor to find this effortless blend of ultra-modern interiors and traditional Chinese beauty. Seven restaurants and bars will delight foodies with a wide array of culinary delights, from modern European at Grill 79 to traditional Chinese cuisine at Seventh Son. Find serenity in the city at the 78th-floor infinity pool, the state-of-the-art health club and tranquil Chi, The Spa. When you're ready to venture out, China World Shopping Mall is a short elevator ride away and the underground Guomao Subway Station can easily connect you to the capital's iconic sights.
offer_address: 1 Jianguomenwai Avenue, Beijing 100004, China

vendor_name: BEI Zhaolong Hotel, in Joie de Vivre by Hyatt
title: Beijing Sky-High Grandeur near Vibrant Sanlitun District
description:
Where French joviality meets Beijing's electric energy - this hotel brings that signature joie de vivre spark to the heart of the capital. Think boutique soul with metropolitan pride, designed to make you feel like you're in Beijing's best-kept secret.

Fuel your morning adventures in the breakfast room before heading out to explore this vibrant city. You're perfectly planted in prime Chaoyang District territory and walking distance from Sanlitun, known for its fashionable dining and nightlife scene. The Forbidden City is also just a metro ride away.
location_description: BEI Zhaolong Hotel, JdV by Hyatt
offer_address: 2 Gong Ti North Road, Beijing 100027, China

title: Elegant South Beijing City Break with Indoor Pool & Three Dining Venues
description:
Experience sleek city living from this high-rise in the heart of the Beijing Economic-Technological Development Area. Set among the headquarters of major global brands, Pullman Beijing South offers a sleek base for business or a quieter retreat from the city centre, while still just a subway ride away from the buzz.

After a day of work or wandering Beijing, wind down in style with a glass of wine at the Lobby Lounge or take time to recharge in the indoor heated pool. Savour refined Cantonese and Huaiyang flavours at D'Ming restaurant, or enjoy international favourites at Cafe Mistral - all conveniently at your fingertips.
offer_address: 12 Ronghua South Road, Beijing, 100176, China

title: Beijing Centrally Located Urban Escape with Enticing Chinese Restaurant
description: Discover what all the Beijing buzz is about when you stay at Crowne Plaza Beijing Zhongguancun, a centrally located urban escape. During your stay, take a dip in the indoor swimming pool and work off any extra energy at the fitness centre, making room for dinner at Rouge Chinese Restaurant. Savour authentic Cantonese and Sichuan cuisine by night, and by day head to Valley Cafe for a global breakfast buffet brimming with all your early morning favourites.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Beijing Zhongguancun, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 106 Zhi Chun Road, Hai Dian District, Beijing, 100086, Mainland China

title: Central Beijing Escape near Tiananmen Square & Forbidden City with Indoor Pool
description:
Step into the exciting pulse of Beijing from a prime location near the iconic Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square. Explore famed history, stroll along the bustling Wangfujing Street for world-class shopping and dining, and don’t miss the chance to try the city’s legendary Peking Duck.

After a day of discovery, retreat to your elegant accommodation and unwind with a cocktail at the Lobby Bar. Relax with a leisurely swim in the indoor pool, or indulge in a touch of European flair with classic French cuisine at Le Cabernet.
offer_address: 3 Jinyu Hutong, Wangfujing, Beijing 100006, China

title: Boutique Beijing Mandarin Oriental Courtyard-Style Indulgence with Four Onsite Dining Venues
description:
Find yourself transported to a world of yesteryear Chinese elegance at this traditional hutong courtyard-style sanctuary nestled in the heart of Beijing Central Axis, moments from The Forbidden City. Accentuated by oriental aesthetics and a generous touch of sophistication, the hotel boasts sumptuous accommodation imbued with sleek and stylish amenities, made for modern living.

Relish contemporary culinary finesse across the property's dining venues, helmed by renowned chefs, celebrated mixologists and experienced tea sommeliers. Feast on Cantonese and Chaozhou cuisine at Yan Garden by Chef Fei, sample authentic Italian dishes at VICINI, sip on creative drinks at TIAO and drink oriental teas at Maple Lounge. If you wish to explore, Tiananmen Square and the Temple of Heaven are close by.
offer_address: No, 1 Caochang 10th Alley, Dongcheng District, Beijing 100005, China

title: Sky-High Beijing Central Business District Stay with Onsite Restaurant, Pool & Spa
description:
Experience the height of luxury in the heart of Beijing, perfectly positioned in the bustling Central Business District. This elegant five-star retreat is just moments from the historic Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square, offering guests the perfect base to explore the city's rich history.

The hotel's location offers easy access to the city's high-end shopping district, with luxury boutiques and international brands just a short stroll away. After a day of retail therapy, relax in the hotel's sophisticated lounge with a cocktail in hand, or indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at Tian Spa.
offer_address: 2 Jianguomenwai Street, Chaoya, Beijing 100022, China

title: Five-Star Beijing Wangfujing Escape Steps from the Forbidden City
description: Experience opulent luxury with a five-star stay at Regent Beijing, perfectly located a short walk from world-famous sites including the Forbidden City and the Temple of Heaven. Indulge in sumptuous dining across seven exquisite onsite eateries, step into a haven of serenity at the spa or plunge into the glittering indoor pool. When you're ready to explore, find yourself in the heart of Beijing's coolest entertainment district known for its fashion-forward boutiques and mouthwatering cuisine.
offer_address: 99 Jinbao Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing, 100005 China
